name: stat
description: A plugin that provides statistical information about a file, e.g. its size, owner, creation date, last modified date, and metadata change date.

main.description: Get statistical information about a file.

FILE_PATH.description: The path to the file to be analyzed.

FILE_SIZE.description: The size of the file in bytes.

FILE_CREATED.description: The creation date of the file.

FILE_MODIFIED.description: The last modified date of the file.

FILE_METADATA_CHANGED.description: The date when the file's metadata was last changed.

installed.description: Check if the stat plugin is installed and available for use.

INSTALLED.description: Indicates whether the stat plugin is installed.

installed.command: read -r INSTALLED < <(installed.sh > /dev/null && echo true || echo false)

install.description: Install the stat plugin if it is not already installed.

INSTALLED.description: Indicates whether the stat plugin was successfully installed.

install.command: read -r INSTALLED < <(install.sh > /dev/null && echo true || echo false)
